entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 18 with temperature falling to 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 18 with temperature falling to 10 in the afternoon. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
